notes:
This dataset contains shapefiles for Guinea, Liberia, and Sierra Leone from the [OpenStreetMap (OSM)](http://www.openstreetmap.org/) project. Each country has its individual file. The dataset counts with contributions of hundreds of users. **This dataset is updated daily.**

The original dataset can be downloaded from the [OSM West Africa Ebola response wiki](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/2014_West_Africa_Ebola_Response#ShapeFiles_for_GIS_softwares).
